availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert B. McCrackin (Newport, Campbell Co Mayor)

body.p: Newport mayor and brick mason. Ireland native. Married Mary A. McCrackin. Father of Sarah E. McCrackin and Mary McCrackin. Newport mayor in 1861.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-029-0592. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 39. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 186.
